Title: The Blessing of the Ancestors
Description:
The blessing of the ancestors is meant to teach young orcs that the living owe everything to those that came before. We must honor the ancestors, seek their wisdom, and live up to their expectations.

Your task is to craft an offering worthy of the honored dead, and worthy of being the centerpiece at the offering stone of the first Kosh'harg of Azeroth! You must put all of your energy into its construction, or it will not be enough.

Cook Torka will guide you. The ancestors will be watching.
ObjectivesText: Talk to Cook Torka to learn about crafting your offering.
